contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionarypar|PMS}} {{TOCright}} '''PMS''' may refer to: == Languages == * [[Piedmontese language]] ([[ISO 639-3]] language code), a language used in northwest Italy. ==Science and technology== ===Medicine=== * [[Premenstrual syndrome]], a collection of physical, psychological and emotional symptoms related to a woman's menstrual cycle * [[Postmarketing surveillance]], the practice of monitoring a pharmaceutical drug or device after it has been released on the market * [[Medical practice management software|Practice management software]], software that deals with the day-to-day operations of a medical practice ===Chemistry=== * [[Potassium metabisulfite]], a chemical antioxidant or sterilant * [[PMS1]], a human protein involved in nucleotide mismatch repair * [[Phenazine methosulfate]] ===Physics and astronomy=== * [[Preâ€“main sequence star]], in astronomy, is a star that has not yet reached the main sequence ===Design=== * [[Pantone Matching System]], a proprietary color space ===Computers=== * [[Pop'n Music Script]], a computer file format for rhythm action games * [[Philip's Music Scribe]], a [[scorewriter]] * [[Project management software]], a broad set of software used to deal with the complexity of large projects * [[Payroll management system]], software designed to manage pay process for organization payroll * [[Property management system]], software designed to manage many aspects of hotel operations * [[PS3 Media Server]], [[UPnP AV MediaServers|UPnP AV MediaServer]] software to stream digital media, such as photographs, movies and music to a playback device on a [[Local area network]] * [[Pavement management system]], software that optimises road treatment strategies to effectively maintain a road network * [[Planned Maintenance System]], software used in the maintenance of large ships ==Society== ===Music=== * [[Plundered My Soul]], a song by [[The Rolling Stones]] * [[Petite messe solennelle]], a mass for choir, solists and orchestra by [[Gioachino Rossini]] ===Nationality and politics=== * [[Partido Mexicano Socialista]], a socialist political party in Mexico * [[Presidential Management Staff]], a government agency in the Philippines * [[Prime Minister's Spokesman]], a post in the United Kingdom ===Sports and gaming=== * [[Pretty Mean Sisters]], a 1990s stable in the World Wrestling Federation ===Schools=== * [[Perth Modern School]], secondary school in Perth, Western Australia * [[Pleasanton Middle School]], in Pleasanton, California, USA * [[Plaza Middle School]], in Virginia Beach, Virginia, USA * [[Piedmont Middle School]], in Piedmont, California, USA * [[Pioneer Middle School (disambiguation)]], link to schools of this name * [[Peninsula Medical School]], Devon and Cornwall, UK * [[Providence Middle School]], in Chesterfield County, Virginia, USA * [[Pershing Middle School (disambiguation)]], link to schools of this name * [[Port Moody Middle School]], in Port Moody, British Columbia, Canada * [[Phillips Middle School (disambiguation)]], link to schools of this name * [[Palmetto Middle School]], in Williamston, South Carolina, USA {{disambig|school}}
